data.value: Katso idea
Katso idea
Biisi on n‰enn‰isesti aidon kuuloinen parisuhderiita ilman suurempia loogisia ongelmia
Parisuhteen hallitsijat t‰sm‰‰ politiikkaan "suvaitsemattomuus oppositiota kohtaan, olemattomat tai vilpilliset vaalit, sek‰ ihmisoikeusrikkomukset"
Kappaleessa pidet‰‰n toisen muuttumista negatiivisena. Tappelut mahdollisestaan konservatiivisella asenteella.
Parisuhde arvokkaimpana yhteisˆn‰ on kappaleen ominaispiirre
Kaksi vahvaa ihmist‰ tappelee kesken‰‰n
Tappelussa vallitseva teema on toisen rankaisu, mutta toisaalta seksi palkitsee, mik‰ myˆnnet‰‰n. T‰m‰ on siis loogisesti neutraali summa, mutta ajallisesti kappaleesta suurin osa on rankaisevaa.
Kappaleessa sivutaan pett‰mist‰, seksi‰ ja sukupuolielimi‰.
Kappale sallii kaiken negatiivisen miehen ja naisen toiminnan ilman heid‰n hallinnassa olevia negatiivisia seurauksia, eik‰ kappaleessa keskustella myˆsk‰‰n riskeist‰.
Kappaleessa ei hyv‰ksyt‰ partnerin toimintaa ja odotetaan partnerin olevan t‰ydellinen.
Kappaleessa on liev‰‰ leikkisyytt‰ ja vakavuutta, mutta on vaikea sanoa, kumpi on vallitseva teema. Kertos‰e on vakava.
Kappale on hieman slaavilainen perus-vakava musiikilta ja sanoituksilta osin
Kappaleessa ei ole hilpeit‰ asioita, vaikka kappale on muihin kappaleihin verrattuna hilpe‰n erilainen. Lyriikassa sanotut asiat on melko synkki‰, jos niit‰ j‰‰ miettim‰‰n.
Asiat on sanottu komediamaisella kontrastilla.
Kappaleen tarinan ihmisten vahvuus ei anna kuvaa, ett‰ kyse olisi erityisen toivottomasta asiasta, mutta kyseinen lyhyt skene on toivoton.
Parisuhteesta n‰hd‰‰n vain huonoja puolia seksi‰ lukuunottamatta, ja sekin n‰hd‰‰n melkeimp‰ 'seksiriippuvuutena'.
Ihmiset ovat tehneet lopulliset mielipiteens‰ ja asioista kuullaan lopullisessa jyrkkyydess‰‰n, kuten oikeussalissa.
Kappaleen er‰s piirre on seksuaaliset seikkailut
Kappaleen ihmiset k‰ytt‰ytyv‰t seksuaalisesti itsevarmasti.
Yksiavioisuus ja sen suojelu on kappaleen keskeinen piirre
Parisuhteen heteroseksuaalisuus on kappaleen keskeinen piirre

S‰e 1:
Kuuntele mua nyt,  ja oo hiljaa
olin v‰‰r‰s  ja oli turha kiista
oon masentunu kun oon saman katon alla
pliis paranna se ja myˆs h‰ivy pois samalla
Sanoisin t‰n rakastavasti, mutta
s‰ et kuuntele, ku muutuit  nii hankalaksi
Menetin luottamuksen suhun kulta
rakas,  s‰ veit v‰rit pois multa
Juorusit pahaa, pilkkasit mua mun kuullen
otit meid‰n rahat ja myit pois mun omaisuuden
Nuku rauhassa  ja pysy lep‰‰m‰s
tekis mieli tehd‰ levostasi pysyv‰
mutta silti m‰ haluun sua hyv‰ill‰
nukkuu lusikassa niinku ekana yˆn‰ yhess‰
Perkele mit‰ roskaa el‰m‰ sun kaa
onkaan mut seksi makeuttaa sen nii en huomaa

Kertos‰e:
Vaimo hei, rakkaudesta meid‰n koti tehtiin
Vaimo hei, ei l‰mpˆ pysy yll‰ ilman liekkii
Vaimo hei, me tehtiin t‰n eteen kaikki
Mee, hei hei, silti susta pysyn eros ikuisesti

S‰e 2:
Mies hei, tule t‰nne, sua v‰h‰n rankasen
otan kiinni palleistas kynsill‰ puristaen
M‰ tii‰n et s‰ s‰rit meid‰t tarkoituksella
s‰rit mun syd‰men ja mut sen mukana
Miks s‰ muutuit? Mihin katos rakkaus?
Leveilet vaikka palkkas on kelakorvaus
Sori kyl s‰ riitit, ja toivoin sun palaavan
mut s‰ pysyit pois ja lˆysin toisen pitk‰‰n halaamaan
olin viekas ja  s‰ et huomannut
et sun kaverisi oli kauan mua kuolannut
palkitsin itseni  aurinkolomalla ja
maksoin yhteistililt‰ ku ryypp‰sit vain sohvalla
S‰ oot ainut syyp‰‰ ja se jo ymm‰rr‰
olin sun vaimo ja olit musta ylpe‰
kuitenkin olit kusip‰‰, petit menem‰‰n, ja
en en‰‰ ala siet‰‰n sua enemp‰‰

S‰e 3:
Meid‰n riita johtaa aina  riitoihin pahempiin
m‰ oon perheen puolesta mut s‰ taas l‰hit bileisiin
ai m‰ oon leija, ei osu herjas ku
s‰h‰n olit meist‰ se joka muihin vertas
Anteeks,  m‰ tein kyll‰ virheit‰
mut m‰ silti tunsin samoin kun s‰ aloit ilkeill‰
Hei, mun muna on ollut vain l‰hiruokaa ku
sun takojakelu on koko suomen luokkaa
Pahin virhe oli yll‰pit‰‰ toivoa,
on off toistoa, on nyt off ja pornoa
Saatampa hukuttaa suruni kaljaan
ja ottaa hetkeksi unohdusta akkaan
Tahoit pois ja sit tahoit s‰nkyyn takasin
yhteen suuntaan ovi k‰y  mun uusin avaimin
Yksin kylm‰‰ on, harmaa j‰lki on eron, varmaan
yksin‰‰n m‰ silti saan olon helpon

Verse 1a:
Listen to me now, and be quiet
I was wrong and there was no point in arguing

Verse 1b:
I'm depressed when I'm under the same roof
please heal it and also disappear at the same time

Verse 1c:
I would say this lovingly, but
you don't listen to me because you turned into a difficult person

Verse 1d:
I lost my trust, honey
honey, you took the colors away from me

Verse 1e:
You gossiped about me and you mocked me in my hearing
you took our money and sold my property

Verse 1f:
Sleep peacefully and stay resting
I would like to make your resting permanent

Verse 1g:
but still I want to caress you
sleep in a spoon like the first night together

Verse 1f:
Damn, life with you is rubbish,
but the sex sweeten it so I don't notice

Chorus:
Hello wife, love made our home
Hey wife, the heat can't stay up without a flame
Hey wife, we did everything for this
Go, bye bye, still I'll stay away from you forever

Verse 2a:
Hey man, come here, I'll give you a bit of a hard time
I grab your testicles with my nails, squeezing

Verse 2b:
I bet you broke us up on purpose
you broke my heart and me along with it

Verse 2c:
Why did you change? where is the love?
You brag even though your salary is unemployment compensation

Verse 2d:
Sorry, yes you were enough, and I was hoping you would come back
but you stayed away and I found someone else to hug for a long time

Verse 2e:
I was sneaky and you didn't notice
that your friend had been drooling over me for a long time

Verse 2f:
I rewarded myself with a southern holiday and
I paid from a joint account when you were just lounging on the sofa

Verse 2g:
You are the only one to blame and you already understand that
I was your wife and you were proud of me

Verse 2h:
however, you were an asshole, you cheated on me, and
I can't stand you anymore

Verse 3a:
Our quarrel always leads to worse quarrels
I'm for the family, but you went to the party again

Verse 3b:
Oh, I'm a braggart, it doesn't hurt to slander
you were the one compared to the rest of us

Verse 3c:
Sorry, I did make mistakes
but I still felt the same way when you started being mean

Verse 3d:
Hello, my penis has only been food in the neighborhood
your vagina's distribution is of the same class as the whole of Finland

Verse 3e:
The worst mistake was to maintain hope,
on/off repeat, it's off now with porn

Verse 3f:
Maybe I'll drown my sorrows in beer
and I may forget my woman temporarily

Verse 3g:
You wanted to leave and then you wanted to go back to bed
the door opens one way with my latest keys

Verse 3h:
It's cold alone, the gray mark is from our separation,
I'm sure I'll still feel at ease alone

therefore we had no point in arguing

'Cause you turned into a difficult person

You took the colors away from me

but sex sweetens it, so I'm not noticing much

to forget my wife for a moment

Verse 1:
Listen to me now and hush
I was wrong and it was a useless fight
I'm depressed to be under the same roof
Please mend it and also fade away at the same time
I'd say this lovingly, but
you don't listen when you turned so difficult
I lost trust in you, sweetheart
dear, you took away my colors
You spread evil, mocked me within what I heard
You took our money and sold away my assets

Sleep peacefully and stay resting
I want to make your peace permanent
But still, I want to caress you
Sleep in a spoon like that first night together
Damnation, what a mess life is with you
But sex still sweetens it so I don't notice

Chorus:
Wife hey, our home was made of love
Wife hey, warmth can't stay without flame
Wife hey, we did everything for this
Go, hey hey, yet I stay far away from you eternally

Verse 2:
Man hey, come here, I'll reprimand you a bit
Grab onto your collar and squeeze with my nails
I know you deliberately tried to upset us
You hurt my heart and me together
Why did you change? Where did the love go?
Smile even if the pay is sick leave
I'm sorry you argued, and I hoped you'd return
But you stayed away and I found another to embrace for a long time
I was sly and you didn't notice
That your friend had long since adored me
I rewarded myself with a vacation in the sun
And I paid from joint apportionment when you only drank on the sofa
You're the only one to blame and I understand that
I was your wife and you were proud of me
Nevertheless, you were a jerk, left, and
I won't tolerate you any more than this

Verse 3:
Our argument always leads to worse quarrels
I'm for the family but you for the near-by parties
Oh I'm a kite, insult won't hit as
you were the one who compared us to others
I apologize, I made mistakes
But I felt the same when you began being rude
Hey, my egg has been only local food as
your cooking distribution is nationwide
The worst mistake was to keep hoping
It's off replay, it's off now and porn
Let me drown my sorrows in a beer
And take a moment of oblivion with a woman
Take it away and take it back to the bed
To a common direction, my newest key opens the door
It's cold to be alone, the grey tracks of the parting are certain
Alone I can still make my condition easy.

Verse 1:
Listen up and be quiet
We were wrong, why keep arguing?
It's depressing when we're under the same roof
So heal it quickly, then get up and leave
I'd say it kindly, but 
You always listen hard, turning into a fool 
My trust in you died, honey
Honey, you drained the life from me
You gossip about me, mock me to my face
Took our money, then sold off all my space
Lie down and rest up
I'd like to make it permanent
But yet I still want to hold you, spooniní just like our first night together 
Damn, livin' with you sucks, but that lovin' sweetens it, hard to notice
Chorus:
Greeting, wife, we made our home through love
Hey wife, the flame, it can no longer keep the heat
Hey wife, we did it all for this
But still goodbye, my love, I'm gonna stay away from you forever 
Verse 2:
Hey man, come here, I'll give ya a hard time
Grip your balls with my nails, squeezing tight
Guess you wrecked us on purpose
Broke my heart when you took us apart
Why the change? Where is the love? 
You brag about your unemployment 
Sad to say, you were enough, and I was hoping you'd come back 
Instead you stayed away, and cuddled up with someone else for such a long time
I was sneaky, you didn't notice
Your friend who had the hots for me for such a long time
I rewarded myself, and jetted on holiday down south 
It was from a joint account I paid for; you were just sitting on the couch
You're solely to be blamed, no doubt you understand it too 
You were my man and I was proud to be with you
But you messed up, you cheated on me, and
I can't stand to look at you, can't stand to be around you 
Verse 3:
Our brawls always lead to worse ones
I stayed for the family while you went to the party again
Oh yeah, I'm boastful, slander doesn't hurt
You were the fool to think it could ever work
Admit my wrongs, but it's still the same
Within the same hour, you kept doiní wrong
Hey, you take away my manhood
Your womanhood is spread throughout Finland
My worst mistake was believing in hope,
On and off, now it's off, replaced by internet porn
Down some beers and forget my lady
Forget her for a while, tryiní to be shady
You wanted to go and decided to lay down
The door only opens one way with my new key in town
It's cold alone, the gray spot comes from our split, I'm positive I will just stay all alone

parts.name: Verse 1a
source: Listen to me now, my wife
Be quiet, also
Listen to me now, my wife
Be quiet, also

suggestion.content:
Let's all be free today, my wife
Go silent and be away

I've got something on my mind, my wife
Just chill and listen to my rhymes

Come and hear me speak tonight, my wife
So still, no fuss, not a single bite

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
Time is ticking just for me, my wife
So stop the fuss and keep still tonight

Listen to me now, hear me loud, my wife
Be quiet, make no sound, no strife

Don't deny me, try to see, my wife
Your silence then could be the key

The time is right to speak today, my wife
Be still and hear me along the way

Open up to what I say, my wife
Stay quiet to be wise tonight

Let's get through this somehow, my wife
Shut your lips for now, not twice

Careful what you choose to say, my wife
Be true and hushed today scarce life

Listen to my words tonight, my wife
Control and quieten your strife

I've got something to present, my wife
Better hold your tongue now quit

I gotta tell you somethin' here, my wife
Speak no sound and just keep clear

Let me tell you now, just listen, my wife
Be still and heed, no kind of friction

We all must know just what's right, my wife
So stay silent, clear the light

Time to focus on me tonight, my wife
Show respect and stay out of sight

Time for me to speak my mind, my wife
Be still, controlled and totally aligned

Tell me what you've got to say, my wife
Remain quiet now, be on your way

parts.name: Verse 1b
source: I was wrong,
therefore we had no point in arguing
I was wrong,
therefore we had no point in arguing

suggestion.content:
I was wrong, still no excuse for the malice
Just accept it, best way to put out the malice

I was wrong, that's plain to see we're different
Still I hoped that somehow we'd be different

I was wrong, but blaming's no help at all
Can't fix our split nothing can at all

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
I was wrong, no more need us to fight
Not much of a reason left in sight

I was wrong, noting's changed since so long
No more words, I just move on along

I was wrong, I can sense the gloom I made
Cannot bring the broken dreams I made

I was wrong, so now I'm paying the price
Can't undo my mistakes not once, not twice

I was wrong, no way through the hollow pain
Perish the thought, I never should make this claim

I was wrong, no real hope for this checkered past
Gotta part ways, I'm the one that it lasted

I was wrong, can't deny facts in the dark
Confess now, or bear it alone for the mark

I was wrong, no delay to apologize
Pain won't leave, yet we need to apologize

I was wrong, had to suffer the blow
Gotta be real, just had no place to go

I was wrong, mistakes become a steep toll
Cost of pride, never pays a profit in soul

I was wrong, can't tear down what we built
Memories stay, as if embedded in guilt

I was wrong, so I'm stuck in remorse
Fleeing the past, no control of the course

I was wrong, lost me a lesson to learn
Depression rises, no more joy that can yearn

I was wrong, torturing me ever more
Emptyness stays, endless difficult chore

I was wrong, left all in broken shards
In my misery, shattered like broken cards

parts.name: Verse 1c
source: I would talk lovingly, but you're not listening,
'Cause you turned into a difficult person
I would talk lovingly, but you're not listening,
'Cause you turned into a difficult person

suggestion.content:
I think about it more than once or twice,
But you keep closing off like a cold-hearted vice.

I would express love openly,
But it's like knocking on a door that's never been seen.

Your heart won't let me in,
It's like it's built with locks and chains.

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
No matter the angle, I could comprehend,
You built a tall wall that no one can break down and end.

I'd tell you sweet words but it's all for naught,
Your heart remains closed and won't let me in thought.

I offer my love freely from deep within,
But you remain separate with walls so thin.

I tell you tenderly, but it strikes no chord,
It's like you're unable to listen or afford.

The love I want to bring, you don't want it near,
Your heart remains hard, like rock or steel to hear.

My words for you are full of affection,
But you've stopped listening like cut off connection.

My words of love pour out from my soul,
But your heart shies away, bearing a stone-cold whole.

My loving words fill up all the air,
But you remain unfazed, like a sturdy mental stair.

The feelings I offer you are so pure and true,
But you keep them away, creating a valley of blue.

Yells of love come out from my mouth,
But you're too hollow to hear them, like a no-sound south.

I'd tell you what I truly feel,
But you remain unmoved, as if your heart is made of steel.

Though my words full of love be spoken plain,
You stir away, like a fearful black train.

I tell you without doubt or fear,
But your heart stays shut tight, even when near.

I say it honestly, truthfully, too,
But your heart refuses to hear me, through and through.

I offer you deep emotion, not just a thing,
But you remain distant, unable to connect a string.

parts.name: Verse 1d
source: I lost trust to you,
You took the colors away from me
I lost trust to you,
You took the colors away from me

suggestion.content:
I lost my faith in you,
Took the colours of my hue.

Lost my trust that was true,
You made all my scenes go blue.

Belief I held was not true,
Hues of life have turned to blue.

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
Lost my faith that was so true,
Now what was once bright is blue.

Lost my trust in you,
Colours of mine ya took away from me.

Trust I gave away to you,
Colours all now feel more blue.

Lost the trust I had in you,
Now seem to have lost its hue.

Trust so true, you discarded,
Colours to me you discarded.

Lost my trust for you tonight,
Colours once so bright, now black and blue.

Lost my faith that was true,
You took the colour from my view.

Lost the trust I held for you,
Colours turned from joy to blue.

Faith in you I could not keep,
Hues of life so dark and deep.

Trust in you I had to cease,
Losing colours, no more feeling the peace.

Lost the trust that I had true,
Taken away my hues of blue.

Trust within you I no longer keep,
Once my colours, now so deep.

No trust left in you I see,
Colours once so happy, now so blue to me.

Trust you held could not sustain,
Colours lost and I'm in pain.

My faith in you, now a thing of the past,
Colours once so bright, now all aghast.

parts.name: Verse 1e
source: You gossiped about me and mocked me to my face
You took our money and sold my property
You gossiped about me and mocked me to my face
You took our money and sold my property

suggestion.content:
You belittled me and used me up like water,
Then left me for dead with no real quarter.

You gossiped and laughed out loud in my face,
My soul's been crushed and taken from this place.

You sneered at me and were disrespectful,
My money taken and self-respect collectible.

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
You talked about me behind my back,
My home taken away - so why such an attack?

You had no words but would still jeer,
My possessions gone like a distant tear.

You made jabs at me and heard no reply,
My wealth gone and rubbed in my eye.

You gossiped on about me everywhere,
The wealth that was ours disappeared without a care.

You mocked me and kept it all hidden,
My assets gone, and I'm incensed.

The words you spoke were painful and cruel,
My future now gone, destroyed is my fuel.

You stabbed me in key places with your words,
My future vanished just like birds.

You spoke without words and jeered all the same,
My assets gone like a winter flame.

You talked about me from way down low,
My wealth robbed and I got no dough.

You spoke my name like it never had worth,
My property gone, all over this earth.

You said what you will - bottom line was blasphemy,
My wealth gone, victim of my hypocrisy.

You made fun and no one cared to intercede,
Your actions took my possessions, no more need.

You watched and whispered and laughed in shame,
My wealth gone, nothing left to claim.

You said what you will without pause or fear,
My gold taken and no way to repair.

You jested and jeered and everyone agreed,
My holdings taken away - my misery palpable and agreed.

parts.name: Verse 1f
source: Sleep peacefully, stay resting,
I would like to make your rest permanent evilly
Sleep peacefully, stay resting,
I would like to make your rest permanent evilly

suggestion.content:
Lay your head to rest, presage a lesson,
Let my rage take you beyond submission.

Slumber in peace, sleep til morning,
My mischief is here for you without warning.

Sweet dreams tonight, the stars will protect you,
My twisted fire will dodge the truth.

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
Breathe in a rest, your image will linger,
My thoughts of aggression can make you shiver.

On your bed of rest, there'll be no testing,
My malevolent rules will bring you blessing.

In sweet slumber deep, shut your eyes tight,
My cruel schemes will bring endless night.

Set your heart at ease, take it moment by moment,
My dark intent can give lasting torment.

In a tranquil sleep, wide and unbroken,
To your soul I creep with my words spoken.

Drift in the night, peace will be sealing,
My anger will come fierce and appealing.

Let me put you at ease, fear will find no dwelling,
My malevolence will bring you a powerful telling.

Lay your head to rest, all the sorrows severing,
My vengeance will come with the worst kind of cleaving.

Find your rest tonight, peace prevailing,
My anger is here, your alertness failing.

To the deepest sleep, no worries cling,
My hostile means will give you a dark sting.

Lay your head to rest, no more woe begetting,
My fury will bring scorn that won't be fleeting.

Slumber in peace, and sleep so soundly,
My venomed intent will surely astound thee.

Close your eyes and take a deep breath,
My wicked plan will bring a dark death.

Relax your body, no more stressing,
My hate will overflow with long-lasting blessing.

Find your rest, the fate you're binding,
My wicked thoughts will bring a long lasting punishment.

parts.name: Verse 1g
source: But also, I want to caress you,
Sleep in spoon like the first night together
But also, I want to caress you,
Sleep in spoon like the first night together

suggestion.content:
I'm feeling my love so freely grow,
Caring for you no matter where I go.

I'm wishing for a life that's fine,
Never wanting love, to be denied.

I want to hold the moment so still,
And always remember your love's thrill.

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
Thinking of how I feel for you,
You bring me joy in everything you do.

You light up my life in the darkest hour,
Forever I'll offer my love's flower.

I never thought, I'd feel this way,
These few words, remind me everyday.

Love is something I want to share,
Our love should be protected with care.

Everything about us is complete,
We make our lives with each other so sweet.

Love is all that fills my heart,
Your gentle embrace, a peaceful art.

Your heart is kind, I see it in your eyes,
Your loving embrace, sets my soul to rise.

I want to show my devotion,
Each day I'm moved by your emotion.

Let me be there for you,
Till the end, Oh I'll stand so true.

I'll honor your presence with kind respect,
Sharing love with no second regret.

Your beauty radiates warmth in my heart,
We could never be torn apart.

My love for you will never cease,
You bring me life's enjoyment and peace.

loving you means so much more,
we will be together forever for sure.

There's a bond between us, that will endure,
My heart keeps coming back for sure.

I feel joy in your sweet embrace,
Your love shines a heavenly grace.

parts.name: Verse 1h
source: Life with my wife is rubbish
but sex sweetens it, so I'm not noticing much
Life with my wife is rubbish
but sex sweetens it, so I'm not noticing much

suggestion.content:
It's a living hell at home, I must confess
But I take the pleasure out of our mess

The way we clash and argue, I can imagine
But still grindin', my loving's no embarrassment

Our relationship's been so messed up for so long
But in each other's arms, both our worries are gone

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
Our fights go on and on and on for eternity
But love-making soothes us, so we get along complacently

I dread my days with her, I freely confess
But sex provides a break, so I have no distress

Living with her often feels like I'm cursed
But sex is an alleviation, so it all comes out reversed

The home life we live is hardly heavenly
But when we make love, then our sorrows flee

I'm in a turbulent marriage, I must say
But sex is a solace, that keeps me at bay

My union is dreary and has me depressed
But emotions arise when we share passion's quest

She and I have constantly argued today
But lovin' gets us in tune, so we're good in this way

My relationship and I seem to be cursed
But pleasure comes from love, so it was all somehow reversed

Marital arguments never cease and we cuss
But when I rock her world, it's complete ironclad trust

Sparks fly between us, and I have no defense
But whenever we make love, I damn sure take full offense

My marital life is a drag and I'm not shy to admit
But I still get pleasure when we straight up do it

Dissatisfaction in our union, it's plain to see
But we find solace in each other, that's our aim to be

We rarely get along, it's a hard rock life
Sex unites us though, I take it as no surprise

Right from the start it's been a challenge, I won't deny
But our sensual spark gives us both anoth reason to try

My wife and I, we're stuck in a cruel game
But in each other's arms, fire finds its flame

parts.name: Chorus 1a
source: Our home was made of love,
the heat not staying up without flame,
even though, we did everything
I'm going to leave you now
Our home was made of love,
the heat not staying up without flame,

suggestion.content:
We saw our love from start to end,
two lovers with a never-breaking bond.

Every moment's worth remembering,
our love forever was kept unbending.

Our home was full of sweet embrace,
never did we just let it go to waste.

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
From the top to the bottom, we felt the heat,
our fiery passion never ceased to beat.

Our home was a safe and sound shelter,
our sweet harmony made it better and better.

Our home was filled with harmony,
our bond so strong it's hard to see.

Our love was always grand and true,
our home together just made it better too.

Two hearts so strong yet so tender,
lust for each other never did surrender.

Our home grew sweeter with time,
with each kiss, no need to question why.

We shared a sweet and sacred bond,
your embrace my shelter from the storm.

Our love was sweet and so divine,
there'll never be one like this again in time.

Our connection kept us safe from the rage,
even in darkness, we stayed in love's stage.

Our lives were blessed beyond compare,
all the memories, no one could ever snatch up and tear.

Our bond was meeting at the higher end,
our lives together truth that would not bend.

Our home gave us such a strong foundation,
and we stood so tall with such elation.

Our love was never about facade,
we were truly two hearts that never strayed.

Our house was home to shared intimacy,
we understood each other's purest sympathy.

Our passion set the fire ablaze,
our love forever would always stay in place.

source: even though, we did everything
I'm going to leave you now

suggestion.content:
Even though we shared the highs and lows
I just have to let you go

Though we tried to make it last
I must now cut the cord and pass

We tried so hard to make it right
But the timing just ain't right tonight

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
We gave it all we had and more
But now I'm out that door

We had so many days in the sun
But now we said our last goodbye one

For us there will not be a time
When I must bid you this solemn goodbye

We've tried our hardest in this fight
But the time has come to wish you goodnight

Our tale of love slowly fades
With this deferred goodbyes unfurled in shades

My love for you will never cease
But now I must leave you in peace

Though we spoke of holding on
Sometimes you have to keep just moving on

Although we had such a strong affair
We must go our separate ways from here

Though you thought that we'd be a team
Right now looks like it's just a dream

Our flame of love has gone out
It's time that I now go about

We thought that this was the one
But now I must take and turn and run

Though we shared a lot of highs
Now's the time I have to open my eyes

We tried to be together as one
But now I'm sending you off with this goodbye song

We may have had a wondrous time
But now comes the time for me to fly

Our joy has been hard to match
But I must face this parting with a simple catch

parts.name: Verse 2a
source: Hey man, come here, you'll get a hard time,
I will squeeze your testicles with my fingernails
Hey man, come here, you'll get a hard time,
I will squeeze your testicles with my fingernails

suggestion.content:
Hey man, come try, won't be a good time,
My advice is to stay out of sight and mind

Hey my dude, don't you be blind,
The message here for you is to peace out of this kind

Hey brother, don't make a sound,
You better know that I'm gonna bring it down

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
Hey mister, no need to pass,
Your plan won't work here, I'll make sure of that

Hey mon, your time has come,
Pull up your stakes now, you won't be stoppin' none

Hey sunshine, don't you be shy,
You won't win this game no matter how you try

Hey mate, hear me here,
Aint gonna let me go, you know itís crystal clear

Hey brother, don't you dare,
Just look away now, 'cause you won't be spared

Hey dude, an end will come,
This gonna be rough, so don't be a bum

Hey homie, it's time to go,
You try to stoppin' me now, it won't work, so don't even try yo

Hey man, you've been warned,
Stay away from me, you won't be reborn

Hey player, don't act blind,
Your lessons here will be read between the lines

Hey brotherman, don't deny,
These rules you break I'm sure you will not live to die

Hey mister, you ain't right,
You don't deserve no mercy, so now you have to face the light

Hey buddy, I'm warning you,
You better think twice now 'cause your time is through

Hey boy, it's time to go,
These walls you just built, I'm about to break and tear them down, you know

Hey man, no need to cry,
When I'm done you'll know that perfection I will try

Hey friend, don't be blind,
Your wrongs here will be gone when judgment I define

parts.name: Verse 2b
source: You broke us on purpose,
and you broke my heart at the same time
You broke us on purpose,
and you broke my heart at the same time

suggestion.content:
I'm so crushed, without a sound,
My broken heart lost beneath the ground.

You fool me with your guile
and filled me with your vile.

I watched my world shatter in two,
My heart was so blue and so true.

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
You were a sadistic tease,
My heart was put at ease.

My dreams of perfection destroyed,
My broken heart so much void.

Destruction is what you chose
And my broken heart I can't compose.

My heart was far too serious,
A fault that you made so mysterious.

My heart you seemed to ignore
And with it my happiness was no more.

You brought me to somber dismay,
My remaining heart so frail and a prey.

You made me feel worthless with your lies,
My broken heart meant less than a small size.

Our relations broke down to dire straits,
My heart silently weeps inside the gates.

Your heterosexual pain I must face,
My broken heart my emotion can't trace.

My fragile heart slowly unwinds,
My love was so rudely unkind.

You broke me without shame,
My broken heart hidden in flame.

You hurt me with your lies,
Your hatred across my eyes.

You toyed with me and did not care,
My broken heart no longer able to be fair.

Your ways were so sly and deceiving,
My broken heart no more believing.

You shattered my dreams with impunity,
My broken heart seemingly without immunity.

parts.name: Verse 2c
source: Why you changed? Why you lost love towards me?
You were bragging even though your salary was poor unemployment compensation
Why you changed? Why you lost love towards me?
You were bragging even though your salary was poor unemployment compensation

suggestion.content:
Gone are the days when love shined so brightly,
It's so dramatic how it all felt so nice and right.

Why'd you quit, why'd you give up so quickly?
It's so typical that you'd ignore the sweet love we had close.

What happened, why'd you disappear?
It was perfection, now it's gone, so it brings me to tears.

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
Why'd you change, what made you be so shallow?
It's so depressing how you quit our love, so what do I do now?

What went wrong, why'd your love dissipate?
It cut so deep, finding out my hope was just too late.

Came to mind, why'd you drift away from me?
It all faded so fast, and left me here alone and blue.

Why'd you go, why'd you stop believing?
It's so confusing why you just gave it up without a plea.

Where did it go, why'd your heart turn colder?
It made me so furious, losing our sacred bond overceptor.

What occurred, why'd your love go transit?
It's so outrageous that you abandoned me and rode it off.

What made you go, why'd you throw the towel?
It was female, so unique, seems like our relationship is pulled.

What stirred you, why'd you turn away from us?
It's so hard to take, I still suffer here in my lonesome rust.

Why'd you shift, what made things take a toll?
It's so pessimistic how everything turned out bleak and old.

Where'd it go, why you'se so disconnected?
It's so complex how you stepped away and let it become neglected.

Why'd you leave, why'd you cut our ties?
It's so ironic that I can't see that bright light in your eyes.

What made you, why'd you find it hard to stay?
It's so perplexing and now life makes me want to stay away.

How'd you go, why'd you put up the wall?
Life's so chaotic, can't restore the pieces before it falls.

Why'd you quit, why'd you put an end to it?
It's so upsetting how you killed the vibe without the slightest wit.

Why'd you change, why'd love just fly away?
It's so depressing and I still remain here in dismay.

parts.name: Verse 2d
source: Sorry, yes you were enough, I wanted you,
but you stayed away, and I found someone else
Sorry, yes you were enough, I wanted you,
but you stayed away, and I found someone else

suggestion.content:
Going along with you, would have been enough,
We could have had some fun, if you had stayed with me.

We could have had it all if you had come back,
But unfortunately I chose someone different instead.

I wanted you to stay, my heart was sure,
But you chose to go, and left me to explore.

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and The Furious Five
suggestion.content:
If you'd have stayed, I had enough of you,
But your leaving made me try something new.

Sorry, you were enough for me,
But you set sail away, and I went and celebrated with someone free.

You should have been enough without a doubt,
But unfortunately I found someone else when you did go out.

My love for you was quite sincere,
But you chose to depart, so I moved on, my dear.

It's a shame you left, I needed you,
But you voyage away, and I roamed with someone else too.

You know that I wanted you, I told the truth,
But then you left, and I had no choice but to find someone else to be with you.

You should have been the one I kept,
But you left me in the dark, so I moved on from there and found someone else to sleep.

I wanted you, that's all I knew,
But you vanished away, and I chose to fill that space with someone else too.

I wanted you, yes I did crave,
But you took off, and so I found someone else in my escape.

If only you had stayed, you were enough for me,
But I had to try something different, so I went and found someone else to be.

It could have been so right if you had stayed,
But you chose to leave, and I chose to find someone else in my way.

I was satisfied with you, that was enough,
But you decided to go, so I moved on and found someone else to love.

Without a doubt, I wanted you,
But you chose to disappear, and I replaced you with someone else, it's true.

I needed you, it's true I did,
But you had to go, so I went on a journey and found someone else instead.

Had you stayed much longer, you would have been enough,
But you decided to leave, and so I found someone else to choose.

that I had sex with your friend
I was sneaky, and you didn't notice
that I had sex with your friend

You felt cheated, didn't wanna hear it,
I explored pleasure, had to share it.

I couldn't help it, went for a ball.

suggestion.content:
Crossed a line, could not define,
Took a chance with my behind.

Flirted around, darkened the sun,

Cos I was naughty, not very polite,
Used your love to find delight.

Crossed a line, didn't know why,
Had some fun just passing time.

Down I went, jumped in the deep,
Found another while you were asleep.

Went a-walking, played my game,
Saw desire, it was so plain.

Had a tryst, so hard to deny,
Stepped out for a polygamous cry.

Searched for pleasure, had to seek,
Found some fun, then a passion peak.

Ain't no lie, I had to creep,
Gave a try, for the love I seek.

Didn't mind, wanted the pleasure,
Had to slide, made a treasure.

Went ahead, no one would know,
Played around, did it slow.

Acted cool, made my moves,
Secret meetings, and private grooves.

Caught my eye, wouldn't deny,
Found temptation in your guy.

Took my chance, ain't no surprise,
Did what's done, through the night's disguise.

Got wild, made a stand,
Temptation pulling me by the hand.

it was paid by your money, 'cus you were drinking

parts.name: Verse 2h
source: you were an asshole cheating on me
So I can't stand you anymore
you were an asshole cheating on me
So I can't stand you anymore

suggestion.content:
You cheated leaving me to cry,
No longer want you in my life.

Committing wrong deeds to me,
I'm done; You've set me free.

I can't forgive the way you lied,
So I've put away our ties.

suggestion.style: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
suggestion.content:
You have hurt me in the past,
This time our river can't last.

You have betrayed what we felt,
Now I can't stand by and melt.

You've done me wrong to stay away,
I can't stay out of your way.

You treated me with such disgrace,
Torn our love out of its place.

This goodbye is all I need.

You thought you could get away,
But now I am here to stay.

Your lies piling up to the sky,
No longer am I asking why.

YourMartin Luther King cruelties,
Meant I had to set my boundaries.

You took the heart we did have,
I'm left in a saddened state of glad.

Your lies brought me so much pain,
Our poisenous relationship was in vain.

You severed every single vow,
That I answered to you somehow.

You chose to walk the cheating way,
So here I am, here to stay.

My trust and faith in you killed,
No longer will I long to feel.

source: Our quarrels leads to worse quarrels
I am for my family but you are partying much

source: Oh, you say I'm bragging? Your slander doesn't hurt me

to forget my wife for a moment

source: First you left, and then you wanted back
But the door now opens one way only with new keys

source: Cold it is for me alone.
